Articles.Content:
So, I've got two mods that I just can't live without- Airplane plus and Mechjeb.

In  1.7.3 they worked totally fine together, but in 1.8.1 they can't even load together. It just gets stuck on loading expansions....

And it sucks.

15 hours ago, έķ νίĻĻάίή said:

So provide the information that is always asked for:

Please post a link to the log files, along with any other pertinent information
